testcase.name: Order food
testcase.system-out: Given the user launch Dominos url...........................................passed When the user click order online now button.................................passed And the user click delivery radio button....................................passed And the user enter the Area/locality in the locate me field.................passed And the user click VEG PIZZA in the top of the margin menu..................passed And the user click Margherita pizza add to cart click two Qty...............passed And the user click Peppy Paneer pizza add to cart click two Qty.............passed And the user click Primavera Gourmet-Pizza add to cart click two Qty........passed And the user click BEVERAGES in the top of the margin menu..................passed And the user click Pepsi 475ml add to cart click twelve Qty.................passed When the user remove one qty Margherita from the cart......................passed And the user remove six qty 475ml from the cart.............................passed And the user verify the cart click the checkout button......................passed And the user view the place order page and subtotal price...................passed Then the user verify the address and price details click place order button.passed
